title: Data Analytics Portfolio
text: Here are a few case studies showcasing my work with R and Python. Each project includes visualizations and key metrics.

title: Hi, I’m Amir Alnajjar
text:
About Me
I’m an up-and-coming data scientist and a current student at Cal Poly Pomona, passionate about uncovering insights from data. My toolkit includes R, Python, and Excel, and I love building projects that combine analytical rigor with storytelling.

title: Hi, I’m Amir Alnajjar
text:
Personal Statement
Data is everywhere, but raw numbers rarely tell the full story. My mission is to bridge the gap between complex data and actionable insights—whether through predictive models, interactive dashboards, or clear visualizations. I’m particularly interested in applications of machine learning in business and social impact. When I’m not coding, you’ll find me exploring data journalism, playing chess, or hiking in Southern California.

Check out my Data Analytics portfolio to see some of my recent work!

title: Data Analytics Portfolio
section: Case Study 2: Sales Forecasting with Time Series
text:
Case Study 2: Sales Forecasting with Time Series

library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)


Attaching package: 'dplyr'


The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':

    filter, lag


The following objects are masked from 'package:base':

    intersect, setdiff, setequal, union

#| fig-cap: "Actual vs. forecasted sales"
set.seed(42)
dates <- seq.Date(as.Date("2023-01-01"), as.Date("2024-12-31"), by = "week")
sales <- 100 + cumsum(rnorm(length(dates), 0, 5)) + rnorm(length(dates), 0, 10)
df <- data.frame(date = dates, sales = sales)

# Simple forecast (naive)
df$forecast <- c(NA, sales[-length(sales)])

ggplot(df[100:120,], aes(x = date)) +
  geom_line(aes(y = sales, color = "Actual")) +
  geom_line(aes(y = forecast, color = "Forecast (naive)"), linetype = "dashed") +
  labs(title = "Sales Forecast (sample window)", y = "Sales ($)", x = "Date") +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("Actual" = "black", "Forecast (naive)" = "red")) +
  theme_minimal()

Warning: Removed 15 rows containing missing values or values outside the scale range
(`geom_line()`).
Removed 15 rows containing missing values or values outside the scale range
(`geom_line()`).
